poweroff.title: Force power off
poweroff.description: Hold the power button for 10 to 15 seconds. The device will reboot, then shut down. Stop pressing the power button when it shuts down while showing the JingPad logo.

bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press & hold the power button and hold the volume down button 1 second afterwards. Select 'Reboot to bootloader' using the volume and power buttons. It should say 'Fastboot Mode' in the corner of the screen.

recovery.title: Reboot to Recovery
recovery.description: With the device powered off, press & hold the power button and hold the volume down button 1 second afterwards.

support.title: Support
support.description: For details about Ubuntu Touch support for the JingPad A1, please head over to the UBports forum thread.

options.name: Wipe Userdata
options.tooltip: Wipe personal data (required for new installs)
